title: On three moon creek: Australian paintings by Gil Jamieson
creator_credit: Tim Burstall, Patrick Ryan and Eltham Films
brief_description: Gil Jamieson’s paintings of outback Queensland life, depicting drought, fire, flood, harvest, and a rodeo. The film is animated by camera movement and accompanied by a ballad written by Tim Burstall and performed by Donald Ayrton and John Earle.
